variables: $disableItems     : false,$disableContent   : false,$disableSelf      : false,$withBreakPoints  : true,$divider          : st.$divider,$important        : st.$important,$prefixItems      : "jf__it",$prefixContent    : "jf__cnt",$prefixSelf       : "jf__self",$values           : ('center' : 'center', 'start' : 'start', 'end' : 'end', 'fl-start' : 'flex-start', 'fl-end' : 'flex-end', 'stretch' : 'stretch', 'between' : 'space-between', 'around' : 'space-around', 'evenly': 'space-evenly'),$filtered         : map-remove($values, 'between', 'around', 'evenly');$addValuesItems   : (),$addValuesContent : (),$addValuesSelf    : (),$justify-items    : map-merge($filtered, $addValuesItems);$justify-content  : map-merge($values, $addValuesContent);$justify-self     : map-merge($filtered, $addValuesSelf);
